_sText:
I've made this map in less than 5 days but there's still a lot to be done.

To be done:

-Proper env_cubemaps
-Decal
-More Vegetation and 3D grass
-Hint and other optimization techniques
-Finishing textures
-Adding my self made custom HQ textures
-Adding soundscapes
-Proper lighting
-Player Clip to prevent players from glitching etc
-More brushwork details
-Adding models
-Adding all planned traps
-Adding music
-Making the map work for ZE (as it should be)
-etc etc etc

I'm not gonna finish this map, I just can't stand it for some reason. My next two projects will be a lot different than anything I've ever done, a different graphic style, different ambient, different setting etc.
